articles.title: The Best 4th Of July Mattress Sales That Are Already Live
articles.author: Jordan Thomas
articles.summary: Several mattress companies, including Nectar, Tempur-Pedic, Siena, Leesa, Helix, DreamCloud, Bear, Nolah, Saatva, WinkBeds, and Brooklyn Bedding are offering discounts on their mattresses for the 4th of July holiday. Updated models like the DreamCloud Premier Rest have been redesigned with improved cooling and pressure-relieving properties, while new options like the Nolah Evolution Comfort Plus cater to heavier sleepers.

articles.title: Trump Mobile Launch Mocked After Bizarre Phone Comments
articles.author: Lee Moran
articles.summary: The Trump Organization launched 'Trump Mobile', a new smartphone brand. However, President Trump stated he doesn't 'believe in telephones' shortly after the launch, creating a contradictory situation.

articles.title: ‘A little like hallucinogenic wallpaper': Campaign Review dissects Amaysim spot
articles.author: Lauren Mcnamara
articles.summary: Amaysim launched a 'Mega Data Deal'. Macca's introduced 'Peak Chicken'. Levande presented 'Everyday Exceptional' service, aiming for a retirement service that showcases vitality and autonomy instead of the usual clichés.

articles.title: TGE Confirms Plan to Launch 15-20 L'Officiel Coffee Shops Worldwide Over Next Three Years  Jun. 18, 2025 22:17
org: World Media and Entertainment Universal Inc
articles.summary: AMTD Group and The Generation Essentials Group (TGE) are expanding their L'Officiel Coffee chain globally. Following the success of the first L'Officiel Coffee in Tokyo, TGE plans to open 15-20 locations in major cities worldwide. These venues will offer specialty coffees, sweets, and a space for exhibitions and events, enhancing TGE's brand and customer engagement.

articles.title: 10 game-changing AI tools powering the future of work in 2025
articles.author: Jon Stojan
articles.summary: Several companies are launching new AI-powered products and services. Notion AI transforms workspaces, Jasper generates high-performing content, Lodestone offers an AI productivity suite, Alison.ai optimizes advertising creatives, ClickUp AI enhances productivity, Hekanize pioneers team relationship management, Apollo.io automates prospecting and sales, GrammarlyGO assists with writing, Imagine Art creates AI voiceovers, and Revic provides AI-powered sales precision.

articles.title: New Stuff Alert: Rothy's Loafers and Todd Snyder Top-Siders
articles.author: Liza Corsillo
articles.summary: Sperry has launched a collaboration with Todd Snyder, introducing updated leather boat shoes and canvas sneakers. Tatcha released a lighter version of its Dewy Skin Cream, while Solo Stove unveiled a portable outdoor griddle. Momofuku launched Mild Garlic Chili Crunch designed for those who prefer less heat.

articles.title: This marketing tech startup is blowing up on LinkedIn, here is why
articles.author: Mae Cornes
articles.summary: Blings is gaining attention for its patented MP5 personalized video platform, which enables real-time, personalized video content without pre-rendering. The MP5 technology dynamically assembles video on the viewer's device, using their name, location, preferences, and even real-time context. This eliminates server-side load and rendering wait times, providing seamless scalability.

articles.title: These Jaw-Dropping Rolexes Are the First Completely New Models in a Decade
articles.author: Christopher Friedmann
articles.summary: Rolex launched the Oyster Perpetual Land-Dweller, its first completely new model in over a decade. The reception to the new watch, featuring a bolder design and innovative movement, has been mixed. The price of the watch is in the low five- to six-figure range.

articles.title: CleverTap Launches "Promos' - The Industry-First All-In-One Rewards Management Platform
articles.summary: CleverTap launched Promos, a new customer rewards management platform designed to help brands create, manage, distribute, and optimize rewards and loyalty programs. Promos aims to replace fragmented tools with a unified platform for segmenting users, automating campaigns, personalizing offers, and measuring effectiveness, ultimately improving customer retention and ROI.

articles.title: Chef Matt Ginn makes oyster sliders ahead of Dry Dock opening
articles.author: Aaron Tanguay
articles.summary: Luke's Lobster will reopen Dry Dock with a new menu featuring items like oyster sliders, prepared by Chef Matt Ginn, offering a new dining experience.

articles.title: Yes, more and more celebrities are entering the phone business. Here's why
articles.author: WYATTE GRANTHAM-PHILIPS
org: The University of Texas at Austin
articles.summary: The Trump Organization launched Trump Mobile, a new mobile virtual network operator (MVNO) that will offer cell service through licensing deals with major cellular carriers. Trump Mobile will also sell gold phones by August, adding to the range of Trump-branded products.

articles.title: Homeowner Was Cleaning House With Some Noise-Cancelling Headphones, And Then A Tree Feel In His Front Yard
articles.author: Ben Auxier
articles.summary: A TikTok user praises Sony's noise-canceling headphones for their exceptional ability to block out external sounds. The user recounts an incident where the headphones effectively isolated the sound of a nearby tree falling, emphasizing the product's powerful noise-cancellation capabilities.

articles.title: Maison Yusif shines on global stage at Barcelona Perfume Congress
articles.summary: Maison Yusif Fragrance's founder represented Ghana at the Barcelona Perfume Congress, presenting on transforming Ghana's perfumery industry. Maison Yusif is championing authentic African scent stories and raw materials, aiming to place Ghana on the global fragrance map.

articles.title: Aimé Leon Dore Teases Two New Balance 860v2s
articles.summary: Aimé Leon Dore (ALD) has teased two new versions of the New Balance 860v2 sneaker. The new colorways include a pink with silver option and a black with orange and green option.  The release is anticipated later this year, with ALD hinting at a 'coming soon' release.

articles.title: I vibe coded a website with my daughter using AI. We're complete novices. Here's what happened.
articles.author: Alistair Barr
articles.summary: Bolt.new, an AI coding tool, was used to create and launch a website for Scrub Club, a soap business. The process involved using Bolt's AI to generate the site, integrate Stripe for payments, and deploy the site through Netlify. The website includes a shopping cart, checkout process, and product catalog, showcasing Bolt's capabilities in enabling individuals with no coding experience to build functional online platforms.

articles.title: Moto G Stylus 5G $100 Off
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: Motorola is introducing the G Stylus 5G, a budget-friendly smartphone with premium features such as a large display, integrated stylus for enhanced note-taking and drawing, and a high-capacity battery for extended usage time. The phone supports 5G network and is priced around $300.

articles.title: Eufy Just Launched a Smart Hub Screen to Dethrone Alexa, and It's Kind of Gorgeous?
articles.author: Matt Jancer
articles.summary: Eufy has launched the Smart Display E10, a smart hub designed to sync with eufy security devices. It features an 8" touchscreen, 8GB of storage (expandable to 512GB via microSD), and a rechargeable battery providing 24 hours of backup power. The E10 is priced at $200 but is available for pre-order at $170 with a discount code.

articles.title: Why Would the Trump Family Want to Run a Phone Company?
articles.summary: The Trump Organization announced the launch of Trump Mobile, a cellphone service operating as a mobile virtual network operator (MVNO). SmartLess, a podcast, also launched SmartLess Mobile, a discount phone plan. Both services offer mobile plans using existing network infrastructure and target specific customer bases, with Trump Mobile offering roadside assistance and telehealth services.

articles.title: SpotStat Offers AI-Driven Analytics For Marketing And Advertising Firms
articles.author: Thurgood Mashiane
articles.summary: SpotStat Ltd, a Bulgarian AI and data analytics company, offers advanced analytical services for advertising and online marketing firms. Using proprietary AI models, SpotStat helps agencies and brands unlock valuable insights, optimize campaigns, and make faster, data-driven decisions. These AI-powered services deliver actionable intelligence that drives real business outcomes.

articles.title: Zaxbys plans to open more than 50 new locations in 2025: Here's where
articles.author: Gabe Hauari
articles.summary: Zaxbys plans to open over 50 new locations in 2025, expanding beyond its Southeastern base. The company has already opened 16 new locations in 2025, including its first in Nevada, and plans to open its first Arizona location in July, followed by expansion into Pennsylvania, New York, and other states.

articles.title: T1 Phone latest golden accessory from Trump world after sneakers, seatbelts and tweezers
articles.author: Kinsey Crowley
articles.summary: The Trump Organization has launched Trump Mobile, a new cell service and phone company, along with its flagship 'T1' smartphone. The T1 Phone, a gold-colored smartphone, will be available for purchase in August 2025 for $499 with a down payment of $100 and features AI face unlocking, fingerprint sensor, 256GB storage, 12GB RAM, Android 15 system, and USB-C port. Trump Mobile's flagship service 'The 47 Plan' includes unlimited talk, text, and data for $47.45 per month.

articles.title: NFC Tap-to-Pay Range Extended: Up to 2cm Reach
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: NFC Forum released NFC Release 15, which quadruples the operating range of Near Field Communication from 0.5 cm to 2 cm. This update also supports NFC Digital Product Passport specifications, allowing products to store and transmit crucial information about their lifecycle, origin, and materials used.

articles.title: Closer Look at the New Balance ABZORB 2000 'Blue/Grey'
articles.summary: New Balance is launching a new 'Blue/Grey' colorway for its ABZORB 2000 sneaker, following the debut of the 'Blue Agate' version. The new iteration features a light blue base with silver and grey detailing on the overlays and is expected to retail for $170 USD. The release date is anticipated soon at New Balance and select retailers.

articles.title: 5 sizzling summer skin care must-haves
articles.author: Rebecca Tay
articles.summary: Rhode is offering The Glam On + Off Set, which includes Glazing Milk, Pocket Blush, and Pineapple Refresh. Charlotte Tilbury markets Beautiful Skin Island Glow Easy Tanning Drops. Tatcha launched The Dewy Milk Moisturizer inspired by Japanese rituals, offering a lightweight formula for lasting glow.

articles.title: Reddit Expands Ad Platform With New Suite: Can the Launch Pay Off?
articles.author: Zacks Equity Research
articles.summary: Reddit launched Community Intelligence, a new suite designed to help marketers monitor live conversations across subreddits, extract trend signals and optimize campaign decisions.  The toolset enables advertisers to analyze sentiment, product mentions and emerging topics in real-time, thereby transforming Reddit's open-conversation network into a dynamic planning engine.  The new suite builds on Reddit Pro and supports full-funnel execution — from awareness to conversion.

articles.title: Breakthrough Agentic AI Capabilities are Redefining Software Quality
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: mabl, an AI-powered testing platform, has unveiled a suite of new features designed to extend its agentic testing capabilities and accelerate software delivery. These advancements aim to provide a collaborative testing experience, proactively assisting customers in software testing.

articles.title: Klarna will soon offer a cheaper alternative to Trump Mobile
articles.author: Craig Donaldson
articles.summary: Klarna is launching a $40 5G mobile plan in the US, accessible through its mobile app. The plan includes unlimited 5G data, talk, text, and nationwide coverage on AT&T's network, with no contracts or activation/cancellation fees. Klarna also plans to expand its mobile services to the UK and Germany.

articles.title: Product Updates for June: Charts, Style Guide and Experimentation
articles.author: Jane O'Donoghue
articles.summary: Rest of World has launched a new 'Charts' experience, consolidating embedded charts into one place with interactive features and dedicated pages. They also updated their Style Guide to reflect new palettes and styles, providing a comprehensive reference for consistent design. Additionally, Rest of World introduced a share tools module on articles on mobile devices and updated visual assets for their newsletter signup modules.

articles.title: T-Mobile Prepaid Introduces New, Perk-Packed Plans Backed by a 5-Year Price Guarantee
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: T-Mobile unveiled details of three new T-Mobile Prepaid plans. These plans are scheduled to launch on Tuesday.

articles.title: £10 off No7 Future Renew at Boots with this great offer
articles.author: Caroline Topping
articles.summary: No7, in collaboration with Boots, is offering a £10 discount on its Future Renew skincare range, including the new Damage Reversal Night Serum. The range includes the new Future Renew Cleanser and Night Cream along with the original Future Renew Serum and Day Cream with SPF40, aiming to reduce signs of skin damage.

articles.title: Is the Trump Mobile really worth the hype? Here's a breakdown
articles.summary: Donald Trump Jr. and Eric Trump launched Trump Mobile, a $499 gold-colored smartphone, on the anniversary of their father's first presidential run. Trump Mobile includes a mobile plan named after the former US President.

articles.title: Tech reshapes China's garment industry
articles.summary: In 2024, Bosideng launched eight AI-generated patterns and brought nine AI-designed garments to market. The company previously launched the "Dengfeng" series, including the fully Chinese-developed "Dengfeng 2.0" high-tech down jackets in 2021 and the lightweight "Dengfeng LITE" in 2023. The company has also developed dynamic cold-resistance technology for its down jackets.

articles.title: 5 simple and delicious recipes to make in your blender
articles.author: Brandpoint
articles.summary: KitchenAid has launched the KitchenAid® Pure Power Blender, a versatile kitchen appliance. The blender features smooth variable speed control, an asymmetric blade, and three presets, allowing users to create various dishes.

articles.title: Google's AI Mode can now have back-and-forth voice conversations
articles.author: Aisha Malik
articles.summary: Google is rolling out "Search Live", a new feature within its AI Mode, which enables users to have back-and-forth voice conversations with the search engine. This feature uses a custom version of Gemini with advanced voice capabilities, offering reliable and helpful responses.

articles.title: Ozzy Osbourne's DNA sold to fans ahead of farewell gig as he says 'clone me'
articles.author: Daniel Bird
articles.summary: Liquid Death partnered with Ozzy Osbourne to launch Infinite Ozzy, a limited-edition iced tea. Each can contains trace amounts of Ozzy's DNA and his signature. The company is selling the limited edition cans of iced tea containing Ozzy Osbourne's actual DNA.

articles.title: Aldi launches stylish summer clothing range including sandals, shorts & £5 lightweight PJs to keep you cool at night
articles.author: Rebecca Miller
articles.summary: ALDI is launching its Summer Ready range, featuring clothing items such as children's summer sets, ribbed short pyjamas, cargo shorts, linen cotton shirts, espadrilles sneakers, and chunky sandals. Additionally, ALDI launched a cooling pillow and a new range of boozy drinks, including a Mango Margarita.

articles.title: WATCH: Ozzy Osbourne sells empty cans of his DNA
articles.author: Bang Showbiz
articles.summary: Liquid Death, in collaboration with Ozzy Osbourne, is selling a new product called "Infinite Ozzy". This product consists of empty, signed cans containing Ozzy's DNA, with the marketing concept that fans might be able to clone him in the future. The cans are priced at £335 ($450).

articles.title: Solana Holds $145 and Hyperliquid Hits $1.89B OI but Unstaked's $5 Utility Setup Leads the Pack
articles.summary: Unstaked is preparing to launch its $UNSD token, which will be required for every AI agent deployed on various platforms after launch. The presale is currently in Stage 21 at $0.011739 per token, with the launch price set at $0.1819, suggesting a potential 16x return. The token's value is tied to its utility, as tokens are used and locked in with each deployed agent, creating built-in scarcity.

articles.title: Yes, more and more celebrities are entering the phone business. Here's why
articles.author: The Associated Press
org: The University of Texas at Austin
articles.summary: The Trump Organization unveiled Trump Mobile with the '47 Plan' including unlimited calls, texts, and data, and a 'T1 Phone' for $499. SmartLess Mobile launched with plans starting at $15 a month offering unlimited talk and text using T-Mobile's network. T-Mobile-owned Mint advertises flexible plans ranging from $15 to $30 a month.

articles.title: Hero to launch Vida VX2 with Battery-as-a-Service model starting July 1
articles.author: India Today
articles.summary: Hero will launch Vida VX with a BatteryasaService model starting in July. This indicates the introduction of a new product (Vida VX) and a novel service model (BatteryasaService) by Hero.

articles.title: How to create AI photos with ChatGPT on WhatsApp today: Step-by-step guide
articles.author: India Today
articles.summary: ChatGPT allows users to create AI photos directly on WhatsApp. A step-by-step guide is provided to explain the process, suggesting a new functionality or integration for users to generate images using AI within the messaging platform.

articles.title: 8 Most Fascinating Barbie Dolls Ever
articles.summary: Mattel launched the original Barbie doll in 1959.  The Barbie doll featured grown-up features and was sold dressed in a striped swimsuit.

articles.title: I tried signing up for Trump Mobile service. Here's how it went.
articles.author: Shira Ovide
articles.summary: President Trump's family business introduced 'Trump Mobile,' a new wireless service. This service includes a promised 'made in America' smartphone.

articles.title: Google Pixel 10 leak suggests a hidden upgrade as well as the obvious ones
articles.author: Chris Hall
articles.summary: Google is expected to announce the Pixel 10 family on August 13, with sales starting August 20. The Pixel 10 may feature an upgraded ultrasonic fingerprint sensor for faster unlocking, enhanced wet hand recognition, and could launch with Material 3 Expressive. The phone will be Qi2 ready and powered by new Tensor G5 hardware, potentially with a different camera sensor for the base model and is expected to be available in different colours.

articles.title: Eufy's new smart display keeps an eye on your security cams
articles.author: Jess Weatherbed
articles.summary: Eufy is launching its first portable smart display, the Smart Display E10, which allows users to control and monitor security devices. The E10 features an 8-inch HD touchscreen, a 4,050mAh battery, and compatibility with Eufy's AI-supported video doorbells and smart locks. It will be available on Amazon and Eufy's webstore for $199.99 starting on June 30th, with presales starting today.

articles.title: 'I discovered £22 lengthening mascara in £13 LookFantastic box'
articles.author: Eve Rowlands
articles.summary: LookFantastic's June beauty box features several products, including the Sweed Pro Lash Life Mascara, Lanolips Lip Scrub, and LookFantastic No Crease Clips. The Sweed mascara provides lift and definition with a unique brush, while the Lanolips scrub softens lips with coconut shell and lanolin. LookFantastic No Crease Clips are handy for holding hair back without leaving dents.

articles.title: Early Prime Day deal drops price on Ninja's space-saving air fryer set
articles.author: Emma Sutton-Williams
articles.summary: Amazon has announced its Prime Day event from July 8 to July 11, featuring early savings, including the Ninja Crispi Air Fryer. This 4-quart portable air fryer system, priced at $159.99, offers versatile cooking functionalities and includes TempWare glass containers.

articles.title: Made-in-America Trump Phones Will Cost Double the Advertised Price
articles.author: Hugh Cameron
articles.summary: Trump Mobile, managed by the Trump Organization, announced the launch of T1 Mobile, a cellular service, and the T1 Phone, a smartphone described as designed and built in the United States. The T1 phone is available for preorder with a price tag of $499 and a down payment of $100, with the company stating it will be manufactured in the US.

articles.title: Madison Avenue Braces for the AI Apocalypse
articles.author: Alex Weprin
articles.summary: Netflix, Amazon, and TikTok unveiled AI-powered ad formats. Netflix and Amazon's formats blend existing ads with viewed content. TikTok unveiled its AI ad format at Cannes Lions.

articles.title: Tencent-Backed MiniMax Releasing AI Tools to Take On Manus
articles.author: Bloomberg News
articles.summary: MiniMax is launching a general AI agent and an autonomous video generation tool. The company has also open-sourced its M1 reasoning model and upgraded its Hailuo text-to-video AI model. These new products and updates are aimed at increasing MiniMax's competitiveness in the AI agent space against companies like OpenAI and Manus.

articles.title: 37 Tiny But Deeply Useful Products You Might Not Have Heard Of Yet
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: The article highlights several new product launches, including Catrice's "Instant Awake" Under Eye Brightener designed for concealing dark circles, Dae's Hair Cactus Fruit 3-In-1 Styling Cream & Taming Wand for styling hair, Oxo's new compact Brew Rapid Brewer, and Glossmetics' Lychee Overnight Lip Mask. Additionally, Naked Sundays introduced CabanaClear SPF 50 Water Gel Serum, and L'Oréal Paris launched BB Cream, an anti-redness moisturizer.

articles.title: The Xbox Ally's Biggest Specs Upgrade Could Just Be Better Windows 11 for Handhelds
articles.author: Lori Grunin
articles.summary: Asus is developing the ROG Xbox Ally gaming handheld, built on the design of the Asus ROG Ally and ROG Ally X.  The device will likely be priced above $600, featuring specifications similar to a Windows laptop, while its processor is especially made for handhelds. Microsoft needs to strip Windows down to its gaming essentials in order to make the Xbox Ally the gaming handheld people want to love.

articles.title: Einstein Bros. Bagels Introduces New Line of Morning Mocktails
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Einstein Bros. Bagels launched Morning Mocktails on June 18, 2025, a new line of juice-based beverages. The Morning Mocktails, featuring flavors like Bros. Bay Breeze and Dragon Fruit Lemon Drop, are available at participating locations nationwide. To promote the launch, Einstein Bros. is offering an All-Day Happy Hour Special with a Bagel & Shmear and choice of Morning Mocktail for $5.99.

articles.title: Everything We Know About Trump Mobile & the ‘Impossible' T1 Phone
articles.author: Margaret Hartmann
articles.summary: The Trump Organization has launched Trump Mobile, a wireless service, and the 'T1,' a gold Trump-branded phone. Trump Mobile is a mobile virtual network operator (MVNO) priced at $47.45 per month and offers perks like device protection and roadside assistance. The 'T1' phone features a 6.8-inch AMOLED screen, 50MP camera, and a 5000mAh battery and is priced at $499.

articles.title: SpotStat Ltd Offers AI-Driven Analytics for Marketing and Advertising Firms
articles.author: Spot Stat LTD
articles.summary: SpotStat Ltd has launched new AI-powered analytical services designed for advertising and online marketing firms. These services offer campaign intelligence, forecasting and optimization, audience and behavioral insights, anomaly detection, and custom data solutions. The company aims to help clients optimize campaigns and make data-driven decisions.

articles.title: NZ Cosmetics Win Big with Certification Scheme Unlocking China's $200M Market
articles.author: Devdiscourse News Desk
org: Ministry of Business, Innovation and Employment
articles.summary: New Zealand's Prime Minister has unveiled a Good Manufacturing Practice (GMP) certification scheme that allows Kiwi-made cosmetics and skincare products to be sold in China's retail market. The new certification framework offers direct access to China's traditional retail sector, offering long-term commercial advantages and brand visibility. This scheme enables companies to reassure Chinese consumers that their cosmetics are not only safe and effective but also sustainably and ethically produced.

articles.title: Samsung to Launch 2025 Line-up of Bespoke AI Appliances in India Next Week
articles.author: The Hans India
articles.summary: Samsung will launch its new Bespoke AI digital appliances range in India on June 25, aiming to provide connected and personalized home experiences. The range includes refrigerators, washing machines, washer dryer combos, and air conditioners, featuring intelligent screens, two-way conversations, Knox security, and SmartThings integration. Samsung is also holding a Bespoke AI Technical Seminar to demonstrate the technology behind these appliances.

articles.title: Amazon Prime Day: Best early home and garden deals include Ninja, Dyson and more
articles.author: Aimee Robinson
articles.summary: Amazon Prime Day will run for 96 hours, starting July 8, introducing 'Today's Big Deals' with daily themes and a 'New Deal Drop' at midnight each day for Prime members. Shoppers can expect savings from brands like Ninja, Dyson and Shark.

articles.title: Amazon Prime Day 2025 dates confirmed as mega shopping event returns with huge deals
articles.author: Eve Rowlands
articles.summary: Amazon is launching its Prime Day 2025 event from July 8 to July 11, featuring a new 'Today's Big Deals' page for Prime members. Various companies like Shark and Samsung and Dreo and Vax and Ghd are offering discounted products during the event, including vacuum cleaners, smartphones, and hair stylers, providing a range of new deals.

articles.title: These Old-School Cleaning Products Still Work Like Magic
articles.author: Tessa Flores
articles.summary: Lestoil, introduced in 1933, is a heavy-duty cleaner for various surfaces. Jubilee kitchen wax, reminiscent of the 1960s, polishes and protects surfaces. Bar Keepers Friend, around since 1882, is a cleansing powder for grease, rust, and grime. Fels-Naptha, around since 1894, is a versatile laundry bar for stain removal. Fairy dishwashing liquid, evolved from a 1898 soap bar, is praised for its grease-cutting ability.

articles.title: Why it suddenly seems like every celebrity has their own mobile network
articles.author: Lisa Eadicicco
articles.summary: Trump Mobile launched a new cellular service with unlimited data, talk, and texting for $47.45 per month. SmartLess Mobile, a mobile service named after a podcast, also launched with cheap capped data plans. These services join other mobile virtual network operators (MVNOs) in the market.

articles.title: Trump T1 Mobile: ట్రంఫ్ ఫోన్లు.. ఫీచర్లు ఇవే.. ఇది మామూలు స్కెచ్ కాదు!
articles.summary: Donald Trump launched the Trump T1 Phone 8002 smartphone after threatening Apple and Samsung with tariffs. The smartphone is launched under the brand 'Trump'.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 7 may come with Exynos 2500 chip: What it means for ...
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: Samsung is launching its new generation of foldable smartphones, the Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Galaxy Z Flip 7. The company has started to tease the smartphones, highlighting their slim design and mix of Exynos and Snapdragon processors.

articles.title: Infinix Unveils SMART 10 Series, Reimagining Everyday Smartphones with AI, Seamless Sharing, and Durable Design
articles.author: The Nation
articles.summary: Infinix has announced the global release of its SMART 10 series smartphones. This new series introduces features like Infinix AI and Touch Transfer. The SMART 10 series aims to deliver a smooth and durable user experience.

articles.title: Exploring Agentic AI: The Future of Digital Workforce Autonomy
articles.author: Research
articles.summary: ResearchAndMarkets.com released a report, "Analyst Perspective on Agentic AI," discussing the next-generation AI and its benefits. Agentic AI operates autonomously, adapts in real-time, and can be applied across customer service, HR, field service, IT, and fraud detection. It is expected to impact businesses and solution providers throughout the 2025-2027 timeframe.

articles.title: Wendy's in St Sampson's Square, York to open on June 19
articles.author: Alice Kavanagh
articles.summary: Wendy's is opening its first store in York, offering both signature items like the Baconator and Frosty, along with UK-exclusive items such as chicken fillet nuggets and the Halloumi Wrap. The store's opening includes a promotion where those in the queue before the doors open receive a free Wendy's single burger.

articles.title: MarTech+ #2: Decoding AI shifts in search, creativity, and marketing economics
articles.author: BE Staff
articles.summary: Adobe launched an AI image generation app for phones. Meta introduced advertisements to WhatsApp. Reddit unveiled AI-driven ad tools designed to assist brands in leveraging user discussions.

articles.title: Thin, light and built to last: New era of Galaxy Z Series - Samsung takes Galaxy Z Series to a new era
articles.summary: Samsung is launching the newest Galaxy Z series, which is the thinnest, lightest, and most advanced foldable phone to date. These phones are designed to be more portable and durable while maintaining the large screen capabilities of previous generations. The goal is to create a foldable device as easy to carry as it is to use.

articles.title: I saved £130 buying Aldi make-up dupes. But was it worth it?
articles.author: Annabel Jones
articles.summary: Aldi is promoting its Lacura make-up range, which is explicitly presented as dupes or copies of existing popular products. The range is part of Aldi's effort to penetrate the beauty market by offering alternatives to established brands.

articles.title: Beyond Mario Kart World: what else is worth playing on Nintendo Switch 2?
articles.author: The Guardian
articles.summary: Nintendo is anticipated to release the Nintendo Switch 2. Other developers are creating clockwork-puzzle murder missions, an RPG reborn, and a beefed-up Yakuza 0 for the new handheld device.

articles.title: 'Game changer for travelling' shoppers praise Primark's £4 beauty item
articles.author: Elle May Rice
articles.summary: Primark launched PS Dry Shampoo Powder, priced at £4. The product, highlighted by TikTok user Ashleigh, is aerosol-free and contains hyaluronic acid. User reviews indicate it's effective, easy to use, and leaves no residue.

articles.title: Primark's 'brilliant' new £4 item is a 'game changer for travelling'
articles.author: Elle May Rice
articles.summary: Primark launched a new PS Dry Shampoo Powder priced at £4. The aerosol-free dry shampoo contains hyaluronic acid, leaves no residue, and makes hair feel soft. The product has received positive reviews and is considered a 'game changer' by customers.

articles.title: Hello Sunshine Launches Sunnie, New Multimedia and Experiential Brand for and by the Next Generation of Storytellers, Creators, and Changemakers
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Hello Sunshine, a part of Candle Media, launched Sunnie, a Gen Z-focused media, experiential, and lifestyle brand on June 18, 2025. Sunnie is designed to inspire young women to reclaim their time and step into their power.

articles.title: Best gluten-free pasta
articles.author: Best Reviews
articles.summary: Jovial introduces Penne Rigate Gluten-Free Brown Rice Pasta, which mimics the texture and flavor of wheat pasta and is free of common allergens. Tinkyada offers Organic Gluten-Free Brown Rice Pasta in a three-shape variety bundle, ideal for cold pasta salads. Banza provides a Chickpea Pasta Variety Pack, a low-carb, high-protein option suitable for those managing their carb intake.

articles.title: DutyFreeZone.com Launches Global Marketplace - Expanding 27 Years of Duty-Free Excellence to Consumers and Wholesalers Worldwide
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: DutyFreeZone.com has launched its global online marketplace, offering consumers and wholesale buyers access to duty-free products from around the world. The marketplace features various products, including alcoholic beverages, confectionery, fragrances, beauty products, electronics, fashion items, and jewelry. The platform aims to modernize the global duty-free experience by providing competitive prices, global shipping, and a user-friendly interface for both B2C and B2B transactions.

articles.title: Adobe Firefly App Launched for Android and iOS Platforms, Allows Users to Generate Images and Videos; Check Subscription Plans With Prices
articles.author: Team Latestly
articles.summary: Adobe launched its Firefly app for mobile phones on Android and iOS, enabling users to generate and edit images and videos. The app supports Firefly and third-party models and offers various subscription options, including standard, Pro, and Premium.

articles.title: MG celebrates sixth anniversary in India with special price cuts on ZS EV
articles.summary: JSW MG Motor India is celebrating its sixth anniversary by announcing a price drop for the MG ZS EV. The ZS EV now starts at an ex-showroom price of Rs 16.75 lakh as part of a limited-time anniversary offer to accelerate the adoption of clean mobility. The MG ZS EV features a 50.3kWh battery, a 176bhp electric motor, and an ARAI-claimed range of 461km.

articles.title: Fractal Named a Leader in Customer Analytics by Independent Research Firm
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Fractal was named a leader in Customer Analytics Services. Fractal's businesses include Flyfish, a GenAI platform for search & product discovery. These achievements highlight Fractal's delivery and innovation in the AI solutions and services.

articles.title: Primark shoppers say £4 'brilliant' beauty item is 'worth every penny'
articles.author: Elle May Rice
articles.summary: Primark has launched a new PS Dry Shampoo Powder, priced at £4. The product is aerosol-free, contains hyaluronic acid, and has received positive initial reviews from shoppers who have tested it, with many calling it a 'game changer'. The dry shampoo is available in Primark stores.

articles.title: Amazon Prime Day 2025 confirmed: Four days of deals from July 8
articles.author: Gareth Butterfield
articles.summary: Amazon has announced that Prime Day 2025 will be from July 8 to July 11, lasting four days and offering exclusive deals for Prime members. New features for this year's event include 'Today's Big Deals,' updated daily, and the integration of 'Rufus,' an AI-powered shopping assistant to help users find products and compare options.

articles.title: EXCLUSIVE 'Clone me, you b*****ds!' Black Sabbath rocker Ozzy Osbourne is flogging his own DNA for £335 - ahead of final gig in Birmingham next month
articles.author: Grant Tucker Entertainment
articles.summary: Liquid Death is launching 'Infinite Ozzy,' a limited-edition iced tea containing Ozzy Osbourne's DNA on the cans. Only ten cans were available for \u00a3335 each. The beverage maker confirms the product has already sold out.

articles.title: Now transform your home effortlessly: Tips for a stress-free painting experience
articles.author: SPOTLIGHT
articles.summary: Nerolac has introduced NXTGEN painting services, offering features like an AI-powered Colour Sensor for colour selection and laser meter for precise paint estimation. The service includes dust-free processes, furniture masking, and expert painters to ensure a seamless and clean painting experience, promising technology-driven solutions and unmatched service quality.

articles.title: Walmart Is Selling a Rugged Water-Resistant Watch for Under $20 Right Now That's 'Stylish' and 'Easy to Read'
articles.author: Michael Charboneau
articles.summary: Walmart is offering the Skmei Water-Resistant Digital Sport Watch for $16, a 50% discount from its normal price. The Skmei watch features water resistance, a Japanese quartz movement, and functions such as a stopwatch, timer, calendar, and alarm.

articles.title: Customer Bought A Bag Of 'Original' Doritos, But They Weren't Ready To Discover What That Actually Meant
articles.author: Ben Auxier
articles.summary: Doritos' original flavor, "Cool Original Sour Cream," is being rediscovered or causing confusion among consumers. This flavor is highlighted as having a "Full-on CRUNCH with an intense COOL ORIGINAL Sour Cream flavour."

articles.title: Samsung Unpacked July 2025 — Galaxy Z Fold 7, Z Flip 7, Galaxy Watch 8 and everything to expect
articles.author: John Velasco
articles.summary: Samsung is anticipated to reveal several new products at an upcoming Galaxy Unpacked event, including the Galaxy Z Fold 7 with a thinner design and enhanced AI features, the Galaxy Z Flip 7 with a larger display and battery, the Galaxy Watch 8 series, and the Project Moohan headset. The event is rumored to take place in July 2025.

articles.title: Best Instant Cameras 2025
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: Polaroid introduced the Polaroid Flip Insta-Camera, blending instant prints with modern technology. Polaroid launched new i-Type film featuring metallic colored frames, deviating from the traditional white frames. Additionally, Polaroid unveiled the Polaroid Music app and a range of Bluetooth speakers, marking their entry into the audio world.

articles.title: Heinz adds zero added sugar & salt ketchup with 35% more tomatoes
articles.author: Niamh Leonard-Bedwell
articles.summary: Heinz has launched Tomato Ketchup Zero, a new version of their ketchup with no added sugar or salt and 35% more tomatoes. Developed in response to consumer demand, the product aims to provide a 'richer, bolder' taste and is rolling out to major retailers. This launch is part of Heinz's recent efforts to reimagine its staple products, including Little Beanz and the rebranded Fish & Chips Sauce.

articles.title: 5 gadgets that turn rainy days indoors into a comfortable and cosy experience
articles.author: Bharat Sharma
articles.summary: Amazon is offering several gadgets to improve the indoor experience during the monsoon season. These include dehumidifiers like TABYIK and Simsen, air purifiers like Qubo Q500 and Philips AC0920, emergency LED lanterns like Wipro Azure and Eveready CITYLITE, foldable drying racks from Amazon Basics and JD Fresh, and aroma diffusers like ASAKUKI Essential Oil Diffuser and Asian Aura.

articles.title: Next-Gen Mahindra Bolero Neo spotted testing, India launch expected soon
articles.author: Ht Auto Desk
articles.summary: Mahindra is preparing to unveil the next-generation Bolero Neo, expected to debut around August 15, with a launch potentially in early 2026. The updated model features redesigned body panels, an upgraded feature list including a larger touchscreen and possibly a sunroof, and may include an automatic transmission option with the current 1.5-litre diesel engine.

articles.title: What Makes Perfect Corp. (NYSE:PERF) a Key Beauty Innovator in the NYSE Composite?
articles.author: info@kalkinemedia.com
articles.summary: Perfect Corp. specializes in virtual try-on software, offering augmented reality experiences for skincare, makeup, and accessories. Their platforms include interactive virtual try-ons, AR-based applications with features like hair color simulation and complexion matching tools. Perfect Corp.'s systems support advanced skin diagnostic technology, and they provide an interactive augmented reality makeup tutorial platform.

articles.title: iQOO Z10 Lite Unboxing: 6000mAh बैटरी वाला सबसे सस्ता फोन! AI Camera, Ultra Game Mode के साथ दमदार Performance!
articles.author: Produced by: मोहिनी केडिया
articles.summary: iQOO has launched the Z10 Lite. The iQOO Z10 Lite features a 6000mAh battery, AI Camera, and Ultra Game Mode, offering powerful performance.

articles.title: Trump's New Mobile Business: Unlimited Data & Gold Phone
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: Donald Trump has launched Trump Mobile, a new mobile network, along with its signature device, the T1 Phone. Trump Mobile promises unlimited data and a distinctive gold-colored phone to compete with established giants like Samsung, Verizon, AT&T, and T-Mobile. The T1 Phone's potential manufacture in China is sparking debate.

articles.title: Buy Washing Machine under ₹14,000 at Flipkart June Epic Sale (12–18 June 2025)
articles.author: Nechhin Wangmu
articles.summary: Flipkart's June Epic Sale from June 12-18, 2025, features washing machines from Haier, Whirlpool, LG, and realme TechLife. The sale offers top choices under ₹14000, highlighting features and suitability for different household sizes and needs.

articles.title: Buy Washing Machine under ₹14,000 at Flipkart June Epic Sale (12–18 June 2025)
articles.author: Zee Media Bureau
articles.summary: Flipkart's June Epic Sale (June 12-18, 2025) features new washing machines under ₹14000 from brands like Haier, Whirlpool, LG, and realme. These models offer features like quick wash cycles, collar scrubbers, and energy-efficient designs, catering to various household sizes and laundry needs. The sale provides an opportunity to purchase these new washing machines with significant savings.

articles.title: Xbox's Future Beyond Home Consoles
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: Microsoft is developing its next-generation Xbox hardware with AMD, featuring both traditional consoles and innovative handheld systems. The new Xbox aims for a more open ecosystem, allowing potential access to multiple digital stores and maintaining backward compatibility. This includes the possibility of playing Xbox titles on handheld devices and blurring the lines between Xbox and PC gaming.

articles.title: Crushon.AI announces launch of advanced NSFW chatbot features
articles.author: DXB
articles.summary: Crushon.AI has launched a suite of new features to enhance its NSFW chatbot experience, including support for over 17 advanced AI models like Claude 3.7 and GPT-4o. A key addition is visual responsiveness, allowing chatbots to generate image-based replies, along with new persona customization tools.

articles.title: OnePlus Nord 4 Price Drops In India Ahead Of Nord 5 Launch On July 8: Check The Deal Here
articles.author: Sparsh Sharma
articles.summary: OnePlus has reduced the price of the OnePlus Nord 4, originally launched at Rs 32,999, to Rs 27,265 on Flipkart. The OnePlus Nord 4 features a 6.74-inch 1.5K AMOLED display with a 120Hz refresh rate, a Snapdragon 7+ Gen 3 chipset, and a 50-megapixel Sony LYT-600 main sensor.

articles.title: Why an unexpected $20 Kmart car buy is selling out across Australia this week: 'Please gatekeep this one'
articles.author: LAURA HOUSE
articles.summary: Kmart has introduced a $20 foam car wash gun, which has gained popularity due to its affordability and effectiveness. The product, designed for use with pressure washers, quickly sold out in many stores. Kmart also released other car-related products like a pop-up bin and a mini rubbish bin for the console.

articles.title: SwitchBot Lock: Unlock Your Door With Just a Tap of Your Wrist
articles.summary: SwitchBot introduces the SwitchBot Lock, a smart lock mechanism that works with existing locks and offers multiple access solutions like smartwatch integration, NFC accessibility, and fingerprint access. The SwitchBot Lock is compatible with iOS and Android devices, and can be controlled with Alexa, Google Assistant, and Siri with the SwitchBot Hub. It supports standard deadbolts and integrates with brands like Kwikset, Schlage, and Yale, and also provides bank-level AES-256 encryption for security.

articles.title: 2TB NVMe Gen4 SSD for $94 + FREE 64GB Memory Card!
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Team Group is offering the G50 2TB SSD bundled with a free MicroSD card. Crucial offers the T500 Gen4 drive for $125. WD is pushing the limits with PCIe Gen5 SSDs, like the SN8100.

articles.title: Dyson vacuums, hair dryers and more up to 50% off: Here are the best offers from their mid-year sale
articles.summary: Dyson is having a mid-year sale. The sale offers savings on various Dyson products, including vacuums, hair care items, and smart purifiers.

articles.title: Claude, ChatGPT, and Midjourney – My Complete Stack for Freelance Design Success
articles.summary: Chatronix introduces a unified platform integrating Claude, ChatGPT, and Midjourney, streamlining project management for freelancers. This AI dashboard facilitates running prompts across tools, saving workflows, and enabling real-time collaboration. Using Chatronix, freelancers save time on client revisions, resulting in a 40% workload reduction.

articles.title: Microsoft announces AMD team-up for next-gen Xbox and handheld devices
articles.author: Marco Wutz
articles.summary: Microsoft and AMD are collaborating to engineer the next generation of Xbox consoles and handheld devices. They aim to enhance visual quality and immersive gameplay through advancements in gaming silicon and AI, while maintaining backward compatibility. The next-gen Xbox devices will not be confined to the Microsoft Store, allowing play across various devices.

articles.title: ELBA Malaysia Completes Home Solution With New Cleaning Range
articles.author: Adeline Leong
articles.summary: ELBA introduced an extensive range of new home cleaning solutions at the ELBA Dealer Convention 2025, which include innovations in washing machines, vacuum cleaners, and dishwashers. The new range of ELBA household solutions will be available in stores from July 2025 onwards at ELBA authorised dealer retail stores nationwide.

articles.title: ‘Never sacrifice performance for aesthetics,' says Sir James Dyson
articles.author: Abhishek Baxi
articles.summary: Dyson has launched the Dyson PencilVac, the world's slimmest vacuum cleaner, in Tokyo. This product's design was driven by the need for effortless maneuverability and challenges the conventional 'form follows function' mantra. The company emphasizes that performance is a priority in the product.

articles.title: Kroger Is Giving Away Free Ice Cream With Coupon On June 20. Here's How To Get It
articles.author: Saihaj Madan
articles.summary: Kroger is launching its 2025 'Summer in a Pint' ice cream collection, featuring four new limited-time flavors: Italian Style Summer Fizz, Fireside Nights, Sandy Shores, and Poolside Tan Lines. To celebrate the launch and the first day of summer, Kroger is giving away 92,000 pints of free ice cream via a digital coupon available on June 20.

articles.title: New School Foods to expand beyond plant-based salmon to other meat alternatives
articles.summary: New School Foods, a Toronto-based food tech startup, has launched a new parent company and opened its Dufferin Street Facility to showcase its food production technology. The company is developing plant-based meat alternatives and has been testing its proprietary directional freezing tech and patented scaffolding process to manufacture prototypes like beef steaks and bone-in ribs.

articles.title: Trump Mobile goes for gold with 5G service launch
articles.author: Amos
articles.summary: The Trump Organization is launching a mobile service called Trump Mobile, featuring an unlimited plan for $47.45 per month. They will also release a Trump-branded gold phone (Trump T1) in September for $499, featuring Android 15, a 6.8-inch touchscreen, and advanced security features. The service utilizes MVNO agreements with three major US cellular carriers.

articles.title: Donald Trump Wants You To Use His New $47 Mobile Plan With A $499 Gold Phone Made In America
articles.author: Chris Katje
articles.summary: Trump Mobile is launching a new mobile phone service with plans starting at $47.45 per month, offering unlimited calling and texting to over 100 countries, telemedicine help, and roadside assistance. Customers can use existing phones or purchase the Trump-branded T1 phone, including a $499 gold version available for pre-order with a $100 deposit.

articles.title: 44 Best Products On Amazon's "Most Wished For" Section
articles.author: Courtney Lynch
articles.summary: The article introduces several new products, including the Stanley Ice Flow FlipStraw 2.0 featuring a wider drink opening and leakproof lid, Catrice's "Instant Awake" Under Eye Brightener with hyaluronic acid, and Touchland Body & Hair Mist offering sweet fragrances. Also featured is the NeeDoh "Dream Pop," a sensory fidget toy with a smooth texture, and Medicube's dual-textured toner pads containing lactic and salicylic acid.

articles.title: Nothing Phone 3: Flagship Killer or Flop?
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: Nothing is expected to release Nothing Phone 3 with upgrades of processor, display and camera. The device will likely have a transparent back design and high refresh rate AMOLED display. It is expected that pricing will be competitive to attract consumers.

articles.title: AI marketing for makers: in-house powerday for your team
articles.author: Daniel Foster
articles.summary: A new 'AI Marketing Plan Workshop' has been announced, designed to guide teams through an AI Visibility Loop with modules, exercises, and insights for AI marketing implementation. The workshop, detailed on Archyde.com, covers AI trends, lead-generation, storytelling, and hands-on application with expert Q&A, aiming to equip participants with practical AI marketing tools and strategies.

articles.title: Jetour, rugged brand with state-of-the-art equipment – Ade-Ojo
articles.author: Theodore Opara
articles.summary: New Era Autovehicle Services, in partnership with Jetour Mobility Services Nigeria Limited, launched Nigeria's first exclusive Jetour showroom in Lagos on June 18, 2025. The showroom offers a range of Jetour vehicles, including luxury SUVs, off-roaders, and electric vehicles, along with after-sales services and financing options. The company also plans to introduce more hybrid and electric vehicles.

articles.title: I'm an Anime Collector. 3 AI Phone Features I Used While Visiting Tokyo
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: Google Gemini features are available on Samsung Galaxy, enabling more spontaneous shopping experiences. This suggests an integration or launch of Google's AI service on Samsung devices, potentially offering new capabilities to users.

articles.title: AMD unveils vision for an Open AI Ecosystem, detailing new silicon, software and systems at Advancing AI 2025
articles.author: Manila Standard
articles.summary: AMD delivered its comprehensive...

articles.title: Philips Hue Play Wall Washer Will Light Up Your TV Viewing
articles.author: Paul Lamkin
articles.summary: Signify has launched the Philips Hue Play Wall Washer, priced at $219.99 for one or $384.99 for a two-pack. The Wall Washer features a ColorCast projection optics system and can be controlled via the Hue app or used with the Hue Play HDMI Sync box for dynamic lighting effects. Signify also announced the launch of the new Hue AI assistant.

articles.title: From Chatbots To Workbots: Why NiCE's AI Strategy Focuses On Execution
articles.author: Maribel Lopez
articles.summary: NiCE is launching new AI-powered products and services, including CXone Mpower Agents, and expanding its collaborations with AWS, ServiceNow, and Snowflake to enhance automation and improve customer service. These initiatives aim to streamline business processes across various departments by leveraging AI agents that can navigate complex processes with minimal human intervention. NiCE is rebranding its company to showcase its vision of AI-powered experiences that are proactive and human-centered.

articles.title: Why Your Small Brand Should Try Experiential Marketing Now
articles.author: Renae Gregoire
articles.summary: Companies are advised to use experiential marketing to launch new products and services by creating memorable and interactive events. Examples include hosting "try before you buy" evenings for skincare brands or launching a new service with an exclusive preview session. The key is to create a reason for people to show up, try the product or service, and share their experiences, ultimately driving engagement and conversion.

articles.title: Voice-To-Voice Models And Beyond Meat: Still Not Ready For Mass Consumption
articles.author: Arkadiy Telegin
articles.summary: OpenAI launched its Realtime API, a one-step speech-to-speech AI model, generating excitement for real-time responses.  Amazon announced Nova Sonic model and Sesame announced Maya assistant. These new models aim to enhance user experience by handling interruptions, conveying emotion, and capturing tone, although current production-level applications still largely rely on multi-step pipelines.

articles.title: Score $500 Off This Yeedi M12 Pro Plus Robot Vacuum and Mop Today
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: The robot vacuum is currently being offered at its lowest price ever. However, the discount may be temporary.

articles.title: Kraft Heinz - which makes Jell-O, Kool-Aid and ketchup - promises to eliminate all chemical ...
articles.author: The Independent
articles.summary: Kraft Heinz reports that 90 percent of its products, based on sales volume, are now formulated without artificial dyes.

articles.title: du and pureLiFi announce  Bridge XC collaboration to revolutionize outdoor CPE deployment
articles.author: Al Bawaba
articles.summary: du, a telecom and digital services provider, and pureLiFi have announced the launch of a new product or service.

articles.title: I vibe coded a website with my daughter using AI. We're complete novices. Here's what happened.
articles.author: system
articles.summary: Coding novices used Bolt AI, a vibe coding tool, to create a website for Scrub Club, a soap business, in about 6 hours. The website showcases a variety of unique soap shapes, colors, and scents maintaining handcrafted artisan quality.

articles.title: Next-Gen Xbox Hardware Won't Be Tied to One Store or One Device
articles.author: Tech Raptor
articles.summary: Xbox, a brand of Microsoft, has unveiled details of its next-generation hardware. This new hardware is designed to allow users to play games from sources beyond Microsoft's store.

articles.title: xAI's Grok Models are Now on Oracle Cloud Infrastructure
articles.author: Guymon Daily Herald
articles.summary: Customers can utilize Grok models through the OCI Generative AI service. This allows users to address challenging issues using the new offering.

articles.title: Slideshow: Taking a bite out of candy innovation
articles.author: Food Business News
articles.summary: Confectionery companies are introducing new products with novel formats and formulations. These introductions aim to innovate and expand offerings in the confectionery sector.

articles.title: Sennheiser HD 505 review: The new superstar in the wired headphones market?
articles.author: India Today
articles.summary: Sennheiser HD headphones are reviewed. The headphones are positioned as a new superstar in the wired headphones market, suggesting a new product launch or significant upgrade.

articles.title: Mint Mobile Offers 50% Off Its Unlimited Plan and a Galaxy S25 Ultra for Less ...
articles.author: Gizmodo
articles.summary: New customers can receive 50% off two years of Unlimited service on the largest 5G network. Additionally, a special offer is available for a new smartphone.

articles.title: Reese Witherspoon's Hello Sunshine Launches Gen Z–Focused Brand Sunnie
articles.author: The Hollywood Reporter
articles.summary: Witherspoon unveiled a new multimedia.

articles.title: Trump family launches phone service
articles.author: Tyler Morning Telegraph
articles.summary: The Trump family is launching a Trump-branded mobile phone service. This new service will utilize existing wireless networks and American-made hardware.

articles.title: I'm Talking Back to Google's New Search Live Mode for AI Convos About Big Events
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: Google launched 'Search Live' for mobile users. This new feature allows users to interact with the search engine using voice to ask questions.

articles.title: Watch your favorite sci-fi shows anywhere in the world and get a free Amazon voucher ...
articles.author: Space
articles.summary: NordVPN offers up to 76% off subscriptions and a free $50 Amazon Voucher. This promotion coincides with Prime Day and the release of season three of Star Trek: Strange New Worlds.

articles.title: Primark shoppers say �4 'brilliant' beauty item is 'worth every penny'
articles.author: Daily Record
articles.summary: Primark's shoppers are praising a new product priced at £4, indicating positive reception for this affordable offering.

articles.title: Is the Trump Mobile really worth the hype? Here's a breakdown
articles.author: The Times
articles.summary: Donald Trump Jr. and Eric Trump launched Trump Mobile, a gold-colored smartphone and mobile plan, with a price point of $47.45. The product launch occurred on the anniversary of Donald Trump's first presidential run.

articles.title: Walmart has this American flag pop-up canopy on sale for $188 off for your July ...
articles.author: Lehigh Valley
articles.summary: Walmart is offering a deal on the American Flag Pop-Up Canopy. This promotion encourages customers to purchase the canopy for patriotic celebrations.

articles.title: Hero Vida VX2 To Get Battery-As-A-Service Feature; Launch On July 1, 2025
articles.author: NDTV
articles.summary: Vida will launch a new battery-as-a-service feature. The service will be offered on Vida's new electric scooter.

articles.title: We found the elusive pink Nike Cortez sneaker in stock — grab this retro style ...
articles.author: Lehigh Valley
articles.summary: Nike is offering its Cortez shoe in pink, available in two new colors.
